about_the_game:
KVLT (reads as CULT) is a grimdark single player first person shooter where visceral old school combat meets Cthulhu Mythos.

In KVLT´s demo you will be able to play the first level in the campaign, which contains:

- Fully playable level with an average playthrough of 45 min.
- 3 Weapons
- 2 Spells
- 5 Enemies
- 2 secrets
- Narrative extending the world of KVLT

We've also used the Demo to gather your feedback and improve it using, so please keep the feedback coming (use forums or )

short_description: Fight your way through armies of Nazi occultists, religious zealots, and unspeakable cosmic horrors to unveil the Eldritch secrets behind the war theatre in this 2000s-era-inspired grimdark singleplayer FPS where WW2 meets Cthulhu Mythos.
